tool.name: PrecursorIonSelector
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out && #end if #if "next_feat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir next_feat && #end if mkdir ids && ln -s '$ids' 'ids/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $ids.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($ids.ext)' && #if $raw_data: mkdir raw_data && ln -s '$raw_data' 'raw_data/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $raw_data.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($raw_data.ext)' && #end if #if "sim_results_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir sim_results && #end if #if $db_path: mkdir db_path && ln -s '$db_path' 'db_path/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $db_path.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($db_path.ext)' && #end if #if $rt_model: mkdir rt_model && ln -s '$rt_model' 'rt_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $rt_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($rt_model.ext)' && #end if #if $dt_model: mkdir dt_model && ln -s '$dt_model' 'dt_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $dt_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($dt_model.ext)' && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if #if "next_feat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -next_feat 'next_feat/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if -ids 'ids/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $ids.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($ids.ext)' #if $raw_data: -raw_data 'raw_data/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $raw_data.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($raw_data.ext)' #end if #if "sim_results_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -sim_results 'sim_results/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if #if $db_path: -db_path 'db_path/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $db_path.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($db_path.ext)' #end if #if $rt_model: -rt_model 'rt_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $rt_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($rt_model.ext)' #end if #if $dt_model: -dt_model 'dt_model/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $dt_model.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($dt_model.ext)' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$out' #end if #if "next_feat_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'next_feat/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$next_feat' #end if #if "sim_results_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'sim_results/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$sim_results' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Input feature map file (featureXML)
file containing results of identification
number of precursors to be selected
Input profile data
The preprocessed db is loaded from file, not calculated
The preprocessed db is stored
Simulate the whole LC-MS/MS run
db file
SVM Model for RTPredict
SVM Model for PTPredict
the modifications i.e. Carboxymethyl (C)
param.help: (space separated list, in order to allow for spaces in list items surround them by single quotes)

section.name: algorithm
section.title: Settings for the compound list creation and rescoring

param.name: type
param.label: Strategy for precursor ion selection

param.name: max_iteration
param.label: Maximal number of iterations

param.name: rt_bin_capacity
param.label: Maximal number of precursors per rt bin

param.name: step_size
param.label: Maximal number of precursors per iteration

param.name: peptide_min_prob
param.label: Minimal peptide probability

param.name: sequential_spectrum_order
param.label: If true, precursors are selected sequentially with respect to their RT

param.name: min_protein_probability
param.label: Minimal protein probability for a protein to be considered in the ILP

param.name: min_protein_id_probability
param.label: Minimal protein probability for a protein to be considered identified

param.name: min_pt_weight
param.label: Minimal pt weight of a precurso

param.name: min_mz
param.label: Minimal mz to be considered in protein based LP formulation

param.name: max_mz
param.label: Minimal mz to be considered in protein based LP formulation

param.name: min_pred_pep_prob
param.label: Minimal predicted peptide probability of a precurso

param.name: min_rt_weight
param.label: Minimal rt weight of a precurso

param.name: use_peptide_rule
param.label: Use peptide rule instead of minimal protein id probability

param.name: min_peptide_ids
param.label: If use_peptide_rule is true, this parameter sets the minimal number of peptide ids for a protein id

param.name: min_peptide_probability
param.label: If use_peptide_rule is true, this parameter sets the minimal probability for a peptide to be safely identified

param.name: k1
param.label: combined ilp: weight for z_i

param.name: k2
param.label: combined ilp: weight for x_j,s*int_j,s

param.name: k3
param.label: combined ilp: weight for -x_j,s*w_j,s

param.name: scale_matching_probs
param.label: flag if detectability * rt_weight shall be scaled to cover all [0,1]

param.name: no_intensity_normalization
param.label: Flag indicating if intensities shall be scaled to be in [0,1]
param.help: This is done for each feature separately, so that the feature's maximal intensity in a spectrum is set to 1

param.name: max_number_precursors_per_feature
param.label: The maximal number of precursors per feature

param.name: precursor_mass_tolerance
param.label: Precursor mass tolerance which is used to query the peptide database for peptides

param.name: precursor_mass_tolerance_unit
param.label: Precursor mass tolerance unit

param.name: preprocessed_db_path
param.label: Path where the preprocessed database should be stored

param.name: preprocessed_db_pred_rt_path
param.label: Path where the predicted rts of the preprocessed database should be stored

param.name: preprocessed_db_pred_dt_path
param.label: Path where the predicted rts of the preprocessed database should be stored

param.name: max_peptides_per_run
param.label: Number of peptides for that the pt and rt are parallelly predicted

param.name: missed_cleavages
param.label: Number of allowed missed cleavages

param.name: taxonomy
param.label: Taxonomy

param.name: store_peptide_sequences
param.label: Flag if peptide sequences should be stored

param.name: min_rt
param.label: Minimal RT in the experiment (in seconds)

param.name: max_rt
param.label: Maximal RT in the experiment (in seconds)

param.name: rt_step_size
param.label: Time between two consecutive spectra (in seconds)

param.name: gauss_mean
param.label: mean of the gauss curve

param.name: gauss_sigma
param.label: std of the gauss curve
LP solver type
Overrides tool-specific checks
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: next_feat (feature map (featureXML) file with the selected precursors)
sim_results (File containing the results of the simulation run)

data.name: out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: next_feat
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: next_feat
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "next_feat_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: sim_results
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: sim_results
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "sim_results_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
